name: Billy the Cleaner
description:
The factory has gone crazy and the robots are trying to destroy everything. All you have is your slippery soap and a brain. Start cleaning your way through the waves of robots and don't let them take control.

Instructions:

Walk: Use the directional arrows or WASD

Shoot soap: Spacebar

How to play:

Atract other robots for traps by making them glide on the soap. But be careful because you may slip as well.

Team:
